name: Downhill to Infinity
description:
Skate and style your way downhill, forever!!

An endless runner with mechanics inspired by the likes of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater and OlliOlli, roll on down and keep rackin' up points to be the very best. But don't get too greedy, and mind the gaps, or you're never gonna score that sponsor you've been waitin' for.

Just do tricks and make those safe landings.

Music by vividlance

Newgrounds

Bandcamp

Menu Controls

X / A - Accept

Z / B - Cancel

See game controls in "How To" section

Also available on Newgrounds
